Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1203.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1203) Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to extend from December 31, 1976, to June 30, 1977, the date for the submission by the Securities and Exchange Commission of a study concerning securities-related activities of banks; and extends from June 4, 1976, to December 4, 1976, the submission date for a study by the Commission of the practice of recording the ownership of securities in other than the name of the beneficial owner.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.
